version_description:
In this version, we provide the following improvements.
* Add a switch to turn on or off autoplay of video.
* Some Friendly tips added.
* Show Feed page when launching app. Previously, it was Popular page.
* Support copying description on Direct Message.
* Bug fixed.

- minor bug fixed and performance improved
- new logo icon

- Remove Downloading Feature
- Bug fixed and Updated for IOS 9

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

- iOS 11 compatible
- Bug fixes

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

- iOS 11 compatible
- Bug fixes
